org.pepstock.charba.client.items

Class TooltipItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.TooltipItem

  • public final class TooltipItem
extends NativeObjectContainer
    Contains all info for every item of tooltip.
    Created and passed by CHART.JS.
    It uses into the tooltips callbacks.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  TooltipItem.TooltipItemFactory
      Inner class to create tooltip item by a native object.
